        public AddView()
        This is the base constructor for AddView objects

      • AddView

        public AddView(int typeBeingAdded,
               java.util.ArrayList<Media> seriesToChoose)
        This is the main constructor for AddView objects involving media (Movie, Series, Episode)
        Parameters:
        typeBeingAdded - int representing the type of object being added

      • AddView

        public AddView(int type,
               java.util.ArrayList<Media> moviesToPick,
               java.util.ArrayList<Media> episodesToPick)
        This is the main constructor for AddView objects involving MediaMakers (Actor, Director, Producer)
        Parameters:
        type - int representing the type of MediaMaker object being added
        moviesToPick - List of movies to add to MediaMaker's media credits
        episodesToPick - Episodes to add to MediaMaker's media credits
